div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1083 Olbia (mod. Parutino), Ochakov raion, Nikolaev oblast, Ukraine, 1936 Burial: c. 300-250 B.C. Contents: 5 AE Olbia: AE (as AMNG I.1 pl. 9, 28-29) Disposition: museum material lost during war Zograph, Ol'viia 1940, pp. 213, 238, nos. 163-7
